author: jsdelfino
msg: Refactored store tests and moved them under test/. Simplified the script evaluation logic a little, added an apply procedure and support for variable lists of args. Added a test case that assembles the store app using a script.

msg: ACE-41 Now we don't have a selection per se when creating associations, we introduced the opportunity for an NPE when updating highlights; introduced a null check for that.
